events.title: Events
events.desc: Workshops, webinars, and events by TensorLab. Join us to learn and build together.

overview.tag: What is an AI Application Engineer?
overview.title: The most in-demand role in the AI industry
overview.desc: AI Application Engineers build end-to-end AI applications — from LLM integration, RAG pipeline design, to production deployment. No PhD or research background needed — just coding skills and the ability to connect AI tools together.

highlights.title: Chatbot & Virtual Assistant
highlights.desc: Build intelligent chatbots that answer based on your company's data, supporting customers 24/7.

highlights.title: RAG-powered Search
highlights.desc: Create semantic search systems on internal documents — more accurate than traditional keyword search.

highlights.title: AI Agents & Automation
highlights.desc: Design AI agents that automate complex tasks: data analysis, report generation, code review.

whatYouLearn.title: Master knowledge from basics to advanced
whatYouLearn.desc: After this course, you'll have the skills to build real AI applications.

items.title: Understand the big picture
items.desc: Know what an AI Application Engineer does, what to learn, and how components connect.

items.title: 6 phases, 18 topics
items.desc: From LLM Fundamentals, RAG, Orchestration, Agents to Production and Advanced topics.

items.title: Hands-on with Demos
items.desc: Each topic includes real demos you can run and understand how things work.

items.title: Build a Side Project
items.desc: While learning theory, you'll build a real product applying what you've learned.

whoShouldAttend.title: This webinar is for you if
items: You're a developer wanting to transition into AI/ML applications
You know web/app development and want to integrate AI into products
You want to understand how to build chatbots, RAG, AI agents from scratch
You're looking for job opportunities in the AI field
whoShouldAttend.notFor: Note: This is beginner-friendly content. You need at least basic programming knowledge.

agenda.title: 6-Phase Roadmap
agenda.desc: Learn sequentially from basics to advanced, each phase includes slides, docs and source code.

items.title: LLM Fundamentals
items.desc: Prompt Engineering, JSON Mode, Streaming, Model Selection

items.title: Agents
items.desc: Tool Calling, ReAct Pattern, Agent Workflows

items.title: Lecture Slides
items.desc: Detailed slides for each topic, easy to follow and review.

items.title: Markdown Docs
items.desc: Detailed docs explaining theory and best practices.

items.title: Project Ideas
items.desc: 4 project ideas with step-by-step guidelines to practice.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey?
cta.desc: Join now to get all materials and start learning AI Application Engineer.

scrollReveal.headline: Ship production ready digital products fast, stable, and easy to scale. Clear architecture, clean UX, and delivery you can confidently operate.

engagement.title: Two ways to partner with TensorLab
engagement.desc: Choose the model that fits: product co-build or outsource delivery.

product.title: Product partnership
product.subtitle: Co-build with outcome ownership and fast iteration.
items: Best when you need a co-build partner from MVP to scale with shared quality ownership.
We cover discovery, architecture, build & operations — not just task execution.
Flexible models: milestone-based, co-build, or long-term — tailored to your context.

outsource.title: Outsource
outsource.subtitle: Dedicated team / project-based / augmentation.
items: Engage via dedicated team, project-based, or augmentation.
Roles: PM/BA, UI/UX, FE, BE, Mobile, AI Engineer, DevOps.
Transparent delivery: weekly updates, demos, PR reviews, QA checklists, and clear handover docs.

process.title: Clear and transparent delivery process
process.desc: Ship the right things, ensure quality, and scale confidently.

discovery.title: Discovery & problem framing
discovery.desc: Align on goals, users, constraints, and success metrics. Confirm MVP scope or phased plan.

architecture.title: Solution & architecture
architecture.desc: Design solution, data flows, security, and cloud setup. Choose the right stack and trade-offs.

delivery.title: Sprint-based delivery
delivery.desc: Build in sprints with regular demos and impact measurement. Prioritize value-first.

release.title: QA, release & observability
release.desc: Test strategy, release pipeline, logging/monitoring, alerting — for stable production operations.

scale.title: Maintain & scale
scale.desc: Optimize performance, cost, and security; evolve with roadmap. Clean handover for your internal team.

caseStudies.title: Selected work
caseStudies.desc: Projects we've delivered, from AI workshops to production systems.

agenticIntro.title: Intro workshop: building agentic systems
agenticIntro.desc: A practical intro to agents: tool-use, workflows, guardrails, and how to iterate effectively.

ecommerceChatbot.title: Ecommerce agentic chatbot
ecommerceChatbot.desc: An agent-style chatbot for product advice, policy Q&A, and ops support with a clear workflow.

insights.title: Few posts, high quality
insights.desc: We write less, but we write deep and practical.

rag.title: From POC to production RAG: common pitfalls
rag.desc: A practical RAG playbook: ingestion, chunking, evaluation, monitoring, and reducing hallucinations in enterprise contexts.

multitenant.title: Multi-tenant architecture: scale with cost control
multitenant.desc: Tenant models, data isolation, RBAC/audit logs, and trade-offs that directly impact cost and operability.

dxImpact.title: Digital transformation: how to measure real impact
dxImpact.desc: Set the right KPIs, prioritize workflows, and deliver in phases to avoid turning projects into a black hole.

t2.name: Mai Tran

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: Didn’t find your answer? Leave a note and we’ll get back to you.

f1.q: Is TensorLab a good fit if I’m not sure about technical requirements yet?
f1.a: Yes. We can start with a short Discovery to clarify goals, scope, and propose a suitable solution/roadmap before building.

f2.q: How do you manage progress and quality for outsourcing?
f2.a: Sprint/weekly transparency: updates, demos, PR reviews, QA checklists, and handover docs. We can adapt to your existing tools.

f3.q: How is product partnership different from typical outsourcing?
f3.a: Product partnership emphasizes long-term collaboration and outcome ownership: framing the problem, advising on trade-offs, and ensuring operability.

f4.a: We can sign an NDA upfront. Access control to repos/environments, secret management, and audit/logging practices are aligned early.

f5.q: Do you actually do AI/Web3 or is it just buzzwords?
f5.a: We do, when it fits. For AI we focus on valuable use-cases and reliable production (eval/monitoring). For Web3 we prioritize security and UX.

finalCta.title: Ready to start with TensorLab?
finalCta.desc: Send a brief or book a 30-minute call — we’ll review the problem and propose an optimal delivery approach.

footer.desc: Tech partner for product partnership and outsourcing. Focused on AI, Web3, and pragmatic digital transformation.
